plugin.name: oeRNC Charts
plugin.summary: OpenCPN support for encrypted OCPN Raster Charts
plugin.author: David S Register
plugin.description: OCPN Vector Charts licensed and sourced from chart providers like Hydrographic Offices. While the charts are not officially approved official ENC charts they are based on the same data -- the legal conditions are described in the EULA. The charts has world-wide coverage and provides a cost-effective way to access the national chart databases. Charts are encrypted and can only be used after purchasing decryption keys from o-charts.org.

plugin.name: StatusBar
plugin.summary: StatusBar Plugin is an optional replacement for the builtin statusbar
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: The builtin status bar (disable from the User Interface tab) has limited configuration options and can be very difficult to read. The statusbar plugin improves on some of these difficulties. Best used with OpenGL enabled (requires some basic OpenGL extensions).

plugin.name: Race Start Display
plugin.summary: Race Start Display, A simple tool for yacht racing
plugin.author: twocanplugin@hotmail.com
plugin.description: Race Start Display, A simple tool for yacht racing, Displays countdown timer, distance and time to start line

plugin.name: Testplugin
plugin.summary: Plugin to test examples of the ODAPI and JSON interface for ODRAW
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: testplugin Plugin is used to test out the ODraw API and demonstrate how to use it successfully from another plugin

plugin.name: DashboardTactics
plugin.summary: Dashboard and Tactics
plugin.author: Rick Gleason
plugin.description: Dashboard PlugIn with Tactics for OpenCPN Provides navigation instruments enhanced with performance functions and alternative input/output functions.

plugin.name: o-charts
plugin.summary: Encrypted Vector Charts from o-charts.org
plugin.author: Dave register
plugin.description: OpenCPN Vector Charts licensed and sourced from chart providers like Hydrographic Offices. While the charts are not officially approved official ENC charts they are based on the same data -- the legal conditions are described in the EULA. The charts has world-wide coverage and provides a cost-effective way to access the national chart databases. Charts are encrypted and can only be used after purchasing decryption keys from o-charts.org. o-charts can handle all charts previously handled by the oesenc and oernc plugins. It thus obsoletes these two plugins.

plugin.name: TwoCan Plugin
plugin.summary: TwoCan Plugin, integrates OpenCPN with NMEA 2000 networks
plugin.author: twocanplugin@hotmail.com
plugin.description: TwoCan Plugin, integrates OpenCPN with NMEA 2000 networks by converting NMEA 2000 messages to NMEA 183 sentences for use by OpenCPN

plugin.name: Celestial Navigation
plugin.summary: Celestial Navigation Plugin for OpenCPN
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: Implements nautical almanac for sun, moon, planets and various navigational stars. Compute position fix from celestial measurements.

plugin.name: otidalplan
plugin.summary: Estimating Positions using tidal harmonics
plugin.author: Mike Rossiter
plugin.description: Calculates Estimated Positions using tidal harmonics.

plugin.name: Watchdog
plugin.summary: Implement watchdog ability for opencpn
plugin.author: Sean d'Epagnier
plugin.description: Set alarms for changing conditions, boundaries, cog, landfall, ais, wind, nmea, weather, pypilot, wind, deadman...

plugin.name: AIS Radar view
plugin.summary: AIS Radar view Plugin
plugin.author: Johan Sman
plugin.description: Radar PlugIn for OpenCPN Shows AIS targets in a radar style view.

plugin.name: Radar
plugin.summary: Overlays the radar picture on OpenCPN
plugin.author: Hakan Svensson / Douwe Fokkema / Kees Verruijt / David S Register
plugin.description: Garmin, Navico and Raymarine radar support WARNING: OPENGL MODE IS REQUIRED! Works with Garmin HD, xHD, Navico BR24, 3G, 4G, HALOxx and several Raymarine radars. When a compass heading is provided it will allow radar overlay on the chart(s). It also allows separate display of a traditional radar picture (PPI). Supports MARPA (even on radars that do not support this themselves), Guard zones, AIS overlay on PPI, and various radar dependent features such as dual radar range and Doppler.

plugin.name: Windvane
plugin.summary: Plugin to provide windvane like autopilot
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: Windvane Autopilot is designed to use the wind instruments and autopilot on board the yatch to act like a standard windvane autopilot and allow the yatch to follow the wind.

plugin.name: Climatology
plugin.summary: Climatology PlugIn: 32 years of monthly NOAA Data
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: Climatology provides overlay capabilities for historic weather data. Supported Climatology types include: - Average wind directions and speed- Percentage of gale and calm conditions - Sea Surface Currents - Average swell and sea state (not yet implemented) - Precipitation, Humidity, Cloud Cover, and Lightning Strikes - Monthly average Sea Level pressure and Sea Temperature, Air Temperature - Tropical Cyclone tracks

plugin.name: WeatherRouting
plugin.summary: Compute optimal routes based on weather and constraints.
plugin.author: Sean d'Epagnier
plugin.description: WR features include: optimal routing subject to various constraints based on weather data, automatic boat polar computation.

plugin.name: Climatology

plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: Climatology provides overlay capabilities for historic weather data. Supported Climatology types include: - Average wind directions and speed- Percentage of gale and calm conditions - Sea Surface Currents - Average swell and sea state (not yet implemented) - Precipitation, Humidity, Cloud Cover, and Lightning Strikes - Monthly average Sea Level pressure and Sea Temperature, Air Temperature - Tropical Cyclone tracks

plugin.name: TideFinder
plugin.summary: Tidal HW/LW prediction into the future
plugin.author: Mike Rossiter
plugin.description: Extends the tidal predictions of OpenCPN using a calendar to allow easier future predictions.

plugin.name: WeatherRouting
plugin.summary: Compute optimal routes based on weather and constraints.
plugin.author: Sean d'Epagnier
plugin.description: WR features include: optimal routing subject to various constraints based on weather data, automatic boat polar computation.

plugin.name: Race Start Display
plugin.summary: Race Start Display, A simple tool for yacht racing
plugin.author: twocanplugin@hotmail.com
plugin.description: Race Start Display, A simple tool for yacht racing, Displays countdown timer, distance and time to start line

plugin.name: Windvane
plugin.summary: Plugin to provide windvane like autopilot
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: Windvane Autopilot is designed to use the wind instruments and autopilot on board the yatch to act like a standard windvane autopilot and allow the yatch to follow the wind.

plugin.name: oeSENC
plugin.summary: OpenCPN support for encrypted OCPN Vector Charts
plugin.author: Dave register
plugin.description: OCPN Vector Charts licensed and sourced from chart providers like Hydrographic Offices. While the charts are not officially approved official ENC charts they are based on the same data -- the legal conditions are described in the EULA. The charts has world-wide coverage and provides a cost-effective way to access the national chart databases. Charts are encrypted and can only be used after purchasing decryption keys from o-charts.org.

plugin.name: OCPN Draw
plugin.summary: Drawing Plugin to allow extra objects to be drawn and used within OCPN
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: OCPN_DRAW (OD) is a plugin that extends the capability of OCPN to include non-standard object: Boundaries, Boundary Points, Text Points, Dead Reckoning paths, Electronic Bearing Lines (EBL) and Guard Zones. The plugin also has an API to allow other plugins to directly interact with it.

plugin.name: Engine Dashboard

plugin.author: twocanplugin@hotmail.com
plugin.description: Engine Dashboard, Displays Engine RPM, Oil Pressure, Water Temperature, Alternator Output and tank levels.

plugin.name: StatusBar
plugin.summary: StatusBar Plugin is an optional replacement for the builtin statusbar

plugin.description: The builtin status bar (disable from the User Interface tab) has limited configuration options and can be very difficult to read. The statusbar plugin improves on some of these difficulties. Best used with OpenGL enabled (requires some basic OpenGL extensions).

plugin.name: Radar
plugin.summary: Overlays the radar picture on OpenCPN
plugin.author: Hakan Svensson / Douwe Fokkema / Kees Verruijt / David S Register
plugin.description: Garmin, Navico and Raymarine radar support WARNING: OPENGL MODE IS REQUIRED! Works with Garmin HD, xHD, Navico BR24, 3G, 4G, HALOxx and several Raymarine radars. When a compass heading is provided it will allow radar overlay on the chart(s). It also allows separate display of a traditional radar picture (PPI). Supports MARPA (even on radars that do not support this themselves), Guard zones, AIS overlay on PPI, and various radar dependent features such as dual radar range and Doppler.

plugin.description: User Sourced database to download and display harbours, anchorages, weather bouys, satellite maps and other interesting cruise-planning objects on the chart and log sharing.

plugin.name: TwoCan Plugin
plugin.summary: TwoCan Plugin, integrates OpenCPN with NMEA 2000 networks
plugin.author: twocanplugin@hotmail.com
plugin.description: TwoCan Plugin, integrates OpenCPN with NMEA 2000 networks by converting NMEA 2000 messages to NMEA 183 sentences for use by OpenCPN

plugin.name: oeSENC
plugin.summary: OpenCPN support for encrypted OCPN Vector Charts
plugin.author: Dave register
plugin.description: OCPN Vector Charts licensed and sourced from chart providers like Hydrographic Offices. While the charts are not officially approved official ENC charts they are based on the same data -- the legal conditions are described in the EULA. The charts has world-wide coverage and provides a cost-effective way to access the national chart databases. Charts are encrypted and can only be used after purchasing decryption keys from o-charts.org.

plugin.name: WeatherRouting
plugin.summary: Compute optimal routes based on weather and constraints.
plugin.author: Sean d'Epagnier
plugin.description: WR features include: optimal routing subject to various constraints based on weather data, automatic boat polar computation.

plugin.name: TideFinder
plugin.summary: Tidal HW/LW prediction into the future
plugin.author: Mike Rossiter
plugin.description: Extends the tidal predictions of OpenCPN using a calendar to allow easier future predictions.

plugin.name: Celestial Navigation
plugin.summary: Celestial Navigation Plugin for OpenCPN
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: Implements nautical almanac for sun, moon, planets and various navigational stars. Compute position fix from celestial measurements.

plugin.name: NmeaConverter_pi
plugin.summary: Plugin to change and cherrypich from other NMEA sentences
plugin.author: RooieDirk
plugin.description: NmeaConverter is a plugin where you can manipulate or add new nmea sentences. It is rather tricky and easy to make mistakes that will 'hang' OpenCPN, but if used right very powerfull

plugin.name: Windvane
plugin.summary: Plugin to provide windvane like autopilot
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: Windvane Autopilot is designed to use the wind instruments and autopilot on board the yatch to act like a standard windvane autopilot and allow the yatch to follow the wind.

plugin.name: S63
plugin.summary: OpenCPN support for S63 Vector Charts
plugin.author: David S Register
plugin.description: OpenCPN support for S63 Vector Charts

plugin.name: o-charts
plugin.summary: Encrypted Vector Charts from o-charts.org
plugin.author: Dave register
plugin.description: OpenCPN Vector Charts licensed and sourced from chart providers like Hydrographic Offices. While the charts are not officially approved official ENC charts they are based on the same data -- the legal conditions are described in the EULA. The charts has world-wide coverage and provides a cost-effective way to access the national chart databases. Charts are encrypted and can only be used after purchasing decryption keys from o-charts.org. o-charts can handle all charts previously handled by the oesenc and oernc plugins. It thus obsoletes these two plugins.

plugin.name: Radar
plugin.summary: Overlays the radar picture on OpenCPN
plugin.author: Hakan Svensson / Douwe Fokkema / Kees Verruijt / David S Register
plugin.description: Garmin, Navico and Raymarine radar support WARNING: OPENGL MODE IS REQUIRED! Works with Garmin HD, xHD, Navico BR24, 3G, 4G, HALOxx and several Raymarine radars. When a compass heading is provided it will allow radar overlay on the chart(s). It also allows separate display of a traditional radar picture (PPI). Supports MARPA (even on radars that do not support this themselves), Guard zones, AIS overlay on PPI, and various radar dependent features such as dual radar range and Doppler.
